channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: SUGGESTION - would you add a 50 repeater ?, 1st September
item.description:
Hello, would Highways consider ADDING a '50' repeater sign to the B4634 / staverton road, just after the staverton traffic lights, northbound ? The first repeater sign is past the motorway flyover bridge. The gateway signs are so close to the traffic lights that, especially turning left from Churchdown, it's difficult to see them. Many thanks ! Nat (Churchdown driving instructor).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
